maqras.text: nowpel del mekh trauv ban bekbak
haey vea ban sdabbangkeab ning brate b tde tam mcheasa robsa vea
haey nowpel del phendei trauv ban leatasanthung
haey vea ban b po ch nh nouv avei del mean nowknong khluon robsa vea haey thveu aoy tte saat
haey vea ban sdabbangkeab ning brate b tde tam mcheasa robsa vea
ao mnoussa lok. pitabrakd nasa anak kuchea anak del kham broengobreng sang champoh mcheasa robsa anak( tohchea ampeula ryy akrak) anak nung chuob trong cheaminkhan( now thngai barlok)
haey chamnek e anak del trauv ban ke brakl sievphow kamntheto robsa ke now daisda
ke nung trauv ttuol nouv kar katsechakdei yeang ngeayosruol bamphot
haey ke nung trauv tralb towkean kruosaear robsa ke vinh daoy sechakdeirikreay kraileng
rie anak del trauv ban ke brakl nouv sievphow robsa ke now dai che v ng pikraoyokhnang robsa ke
ke nung srek danghoy tha vineasa a nd reay haey khnhom
haey ke nung chaul knong phleung nork del cheh yeang santho santhow
pitabrakd nasa ke thleab rsanow knong lokey cheamuoynung krom kruosaear robsa ke yeang sabbayrikreay
pitabrakd nasa ke ban kitthea ke nung min trauv vilotralb ( towkean a l laoh) vinh laey
min dauchnaoh te. pitabrakd nasa mcheasa robsa ke doeng bamphot champoh roubke
dau che neah yeung sbath nung pelothngai rieb lich
ning peloyb ning avei del ban bramoulophdom
ning preah chnt nowpel del vea ban reah penhovng
puok anak nung vivodd pi damnakkal muoy tow damnakkal muoy ( nowknong lokey)
dau che neah tae mean rueng ei v tow ban chea puokke kmean chomnue
haey nowpel del mean ke sautr kompir kuor an aoy puokke sdab puokke min saou chout laey
min tebonnaoh puok del kmean chomnue themtang bdeseth tiet phng
haey a l laoh doeng bamphot nouv avei del puokke leak touk now knong chetd
dau che neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) brab puokke ampi tearounakamm da sen chhucheab choh
leuklengte banda anak del mean chomnue ning ban sang ampeula troemotrauv bonnaoh . puokke nung ttuol ban phalbony daoy it konnea
a l laoh sbath nung mekh del mean phkay cheachraen
ning thngai del ban sanyea( thngai barlok)
ning anak del thveusaeaksaei haeyning phosdo tang teanglay del ke yk mk bangheanh
ke ban dakbandasa champoh krom au kh tout( chea puok del chik rondaw samleab anak mean chomnue)
chea rondaw phleung del mean kamnat ausa
khn del puokke angkouy now choumvinh rondaw phleung noh
daoy puokke samlung meul towleu avei del puokke kampoung br pru td towleu banda anak del mean chomnue
haey puokke ban thveubeab banda anak del mean chomnue ku daoy sar te puokke mean chomnue leu a l laoh da mha khlangpouke ning chea ti kaotasarsaer
kuchea anak del mean karokrobkrong mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei . haey a l laoh kuchea saksaei towleu avei teangoasa

pitabrakd nasa puok del dot banda anak del mean chomnue brosasrei banteabmk puokke minban sarphap tosakamhosa ( champoh a l laoh) te noh puokke nung trauv ttuol tearounakamm nowknong nork cheu han nam ning ttuol tearounakamm del chabcheh yeang chhucheab bamphot
pitabrakd nasa banda anak del mean chomnue ning ban sang ampeula troemotrauv noh puokke nung ttuol ban thansuokr del mean t ne l cheachraen haur pi kraom vea . noh kuchea chokchy da thomtheng
pitabrakd nasa tearounakamm nei mcheasa robsa anak ku khlangokla bamphot
pitabrakd nasa trong kuchea anak del bangkeut ning chea anak thveu aoy rsa laengvinh
haey trong mha aphytosa mha anet sraleanh
mcheasa nei a r sh da thkomthkaeng
chea mcheasa del thveuteam avei del trong mean chetnea
tae rueng robsa kangtp ban mokadl anak( mou ham meat) ryyte
(dauchchea) hvie r aon ning sa mou d
phtoytowvinh puok del kmean chomnue nowte pyeayeam bdeseth
haey a l laoh kuchea anak laomptth pi khangokraoy puokke ( doeng real sakammopheap robsa puokke)
phtoytowvinh vea kuchea kompir kuor an da mha thkomthkaeng
del mean nowknong sievphow kamnttra( lav ho l mah- hvou sa)
a l laoh sbath nung mekh ning at t ri k
haey avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha at t ri k chea avei noh
kuchea phkay del mean rosmei phluchenhchach
bokkol krob roub ku sotthote mean anak theroksaa ke
dau che neah chaur aoy mnoussa lok meul choh tha tae roubke trauv ban bangkeut mk pi avei
roubke trauv ban bangkeut mk pi tuk del banh chenh( pi bradeab phetborsa chaul tow knong bradeab phet sdrei)
del vea chenhpi chhaoengokhnang borsa ning chhaoengchomni sdrei
pitabrakd nasa trong chea anak mean anoupheap knong kar thveu aoy ke rsa laengvinh
now thngai del athrkambang teangoasa trauv ban leatatradeang
pelnoh ke kmean amnach haeyka kmean anak chuoy der
a l laoh sbath nung mekh del mean phlieng thleak mdong haey mdongtiet
ning phendei del meankar be reah bek( daoysaar roukkhcheate loutleasa)
pitabrakd nasa vea( kompir kuor an) kuchea peakyapech del mean karbengchek( rveang khosa ning trauv)
haey kompir kuor an ka minmen samreab lengsaech der
pitabrakd nasa puokke riebcham lbichakl akrak(daembi brachheang nung mou ham meat)
haey yeung ka mean phenkar( daembi tabt nung puokke)vinh der
dau che neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) ponyearpel aoy puok kmean chomnue ning rngcham meul puokke muoy ry sen choh
